Description: The conditional expression  "raw == "localhost" || raw.StartsWith("localhost:") ||                  raw == "http://localhost" || raw.StartsWith("http://localhost:") ||                  raw == "https://localhost" || raw.StartsWith("https://localhost:")"  is complex.

The following statement contains a magic number: if (IsURL(raw))              {                  return new List<Result>                  {                      new Result                      {                          Title = raw'                          SubTitle = string.Format(context.API.GetTranslation("wox_plugin_url_open_url")'raw)'                          IcoPath = "Images/url.png"'                          Score = 8'                          Action = _ =>                          {                              if (!raw.ToLower().StartsWith("http"))                              {                                  raw = "http://" + raw;                              }                              try                              {                                  Process.Start(raw);                                  return true;                              }                              catch(Exception ex)                              {                                  context.API.ShowMsg(string.Format(context.API.GetTranslation("wox_plugin_url_canot_open_url")' raw));                                  return false;                              }                          }                      }                  };              }
